rows.label: qst700801_msg0001
rows.name:
Hello, sweetlings! What can I do for
you? I warn you now, I'm not exactly
the most able-bodied person here!

rows.label: qst700801_msg0002
rows.name:
I am Oulu. I run the accessory shop
back in Formide Shopping Ward, 
though you might not know it.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0003
rows.name:
Ever since I've put my granddaughter
in charge of the stall, I've become quite
partial to my daily walks!

rows.label: qst700801_msg0004
rows.name:
The Outrider's Forest Trail in
particular is a lovely walk.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0005
rows.name:
There are moments when the sunlight
dapples through the trees, and I think
to myself, pah! Who needs Elysium?

rows.label: qst700801_msg0006
rows.name:
Ohh, it was idyllic... At least, up until
recently.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0008
rows.name:
These days, the forest is so littered
with junk that you can't really
appreciate its beauty any more.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0009
rows.name:
At first, I tried to clean it up myself,
so I did.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0010
rows.name:
But try as I might, the litter would not
go away. Piling up faster than I could
get rid of it!

rows.label: qst700801_msg0011
rows.name:
"At this rate," I thought to myself,
"I'll have to abandon my lovely walk
and find somewhere else!"

rows.label: qst700801_msg0012
rows.name:
Would you be a dear and help me
clean the place up? You're sure to
do a better job than I!

rows.label: qst700801_msg0101
rows.name:
The problem is that there's just so
much of the stuff, you understand?

rows.label: qst700801_msg0102
rows.name:
I noticed about four spots with litter on
my last walk. Please, have a good look
through the forest for me, would you?

rows.label: qst700801_msg0201
rows.name: So it was Nopon, was it? Hrm...

rows.label: qst700801_msg0202
rows.name:
I had a suspicion it might be those
kids.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0203
rows.name:
Would you mind bringing them to me?
I'd like to have a word with them.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0204
rows.name:
They're always running around treating
the city like their playground. They'll
be playing hide and seek, no doubt.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0205
rows.name:
If you could do this for me, I'd be ever
so grateful.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0301
rows.name:
I had a suspicion it might be those
kids.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0302
rows.name:
Would you mind bringing them to me?
I'd like to have a word with them.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0303
rows.name:
They're always running around treating
the city like their playground. They'll
be playing hide and seek, no doubt.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0304
rows.name:
If you could do this for me, I'd be ever
so grateful.
